__e: That's none of your business, that's police business.
Also for me, believe me, but you'll see, next time you'll do it alone.
Having a house like this, you'll make a good impression on others.
Pretty soon you'll see that this is just like every other mining town.
The old man will see that others can do the job just as well as him.
If anybody checks my phone, they'll see I was at the house that night.
And that's what the rest of the world will see.
I want to see my nephew's face when he sees your new studio.
I mean, he may have a plan, but... that plan may change once he sees her face for the first time after all these years.
No one will see us, except your friend.
[Crystal] He turns the cameras off, so we can do whatever we wants and no one will see us.

And you'll be dealing with me today.
